CustomField.description: Total number of (partial soft-credit) gifts made by this Account. See "Combined Total Number of Gifts" for overall # of gifts (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total number of (partial soft-credit) gifts made by this Account. See "Combined Total Number of Gifts" for overall # of gifts (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.label: Total # of Partial Soft Credit Gifts
